Html:
Hi,

Html Agility Pack is a great product, but... I am a bit confused with the license. Is anybody using it in the commercial solutions? How can I use it with commercial closed-source software?

Best regards, Oleg Yaroshevych.

I don't think you can, because even though it isn't defined as non-commerical, you have to share it under a similar license i.e. distribute the source code.

You can however speak directly to the developers and have this license waived with their consent.

I disagree.  The license states:
  • each contributor grants you a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free copyright license...
    • to reproduce its contribution, prepare derivative works of its contribution, and distribute its contribution or any derivative works that you create.
    • to make, have made, use, sell, offer for sale, import, and/or otherwise dispose of its contribution in the software or derivative works of the contribution in the software.
  • do not use their trademarks, brand, etc
  • leave copyrights in the software
  • if you distribute the source, include the full source
  • if you distribute the binary, comply with this license
read the license tab.  Its pretty clear and "open"

Looks like the license was changed to a more appropriate one on April 24, 2009.

   http://htmlagilitypack.codeplex.com/license

The old version said you couldn't dance to HtmlAgilityPack in public without providing source code or some such thing.

-Mike

Team,

Thanks for changing the license. This solves all issues.

Best regards, Oleg Yaroshevych.
I changed the licence recently because there were many questions about it. Back then, when CodePlex opened, there were not so many choices :)
